sorcer.core.provider

Interface Cataloger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceCataloger

    public interface Cataloger
extends Service, java.rmi.Remote
    Defines the interface for the SORCER catalog service. It is implemented by ServiceCataloger.

      • lookup

        net.jini.core.lookup.ServiceMatches lookup(net.jini.core.lookup.ServiceTemplate tmpl,
                                           int maxMatches)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns at most maxMatches items matching the template, plus the total number of items that match the template. The return value is never null, and the returned items array is only null if maxMatches is zero. For each returned item, if the service object cannot be deserialized, the service field of the item is set to null and no exception is thrown. Similarly, if an attribute set cannot be deserialized, that element of the attributeSets array is set to null and no exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        tmpl - - template to match
        maxMatches -
        Returns:
        a ServiceMatches instance that contains at most maxMatches items matching the template, plus the total number of items that match the template. The return value is never null, and the returned items array is only null if maxMatches is zero.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getProviderMethods

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getProviderMethods()
                                                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a map with a key as service interface (those interfaces which are placed under package sorcer.provider or sorcer.core.provider) and its value is a list of interface's method names.
        Returns:
        a hash map of all SORCER provider interfaces with corresponding method names.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getProviderCodebaseURLs

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.net.URL[]> getProviderCodebaseURLs()
                                                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a map with a key as service name (only those services that implement sorcer.service.Service interface) and a list of Codebase URLs for that service
        Returns:
        a hash map of all SORCER provider names with corresponding codebase URLs.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getInterfaceList

        java.lang.String[] getInterfaceList(java.lang.String serviceType)
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a String array of the interfaces defined by the given provider name. The interface list excludes the common interface names.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - Service type of the currently selected provider
        Returns:
        a String array of the interfaces defined by the provider
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • exertService

        Context exertService(java.lang.String providerName,
                     java.lang.Class serviceType,
                     java.lang.String methodName,
                     Context theContext)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Create an exertion on the provider specified, sending the context to the method specified.
        Parameters:
        providerName - String of the currently selected provider
        serviceType - the currently selected interface
        methodName - String of the currently selected method name
        Returns:
        Context with the results of the exertion
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
